text:
The Metaverse is an incredible creation made by Alex Dupont. It's a software made to be run on Vr headset. The principal point of this software it's to create the next big place of social event and work place. Metaverse is divided in small world where you can do a lot of different things : Hold a meeting, Buy a house, do social gathering. In some ways it ressemble Ready player one, a place where you can do everything but in the metaverse you are link to your facebook you cannot fake your identity and u have to pay with real money.  But it runs with big data problems and usage, meta got problems with EU about the usage of data in americans data centers where meta want to transfer EU data in Paris to be able to analyse it. The EU did not flinch and will not let it happen so meta threatens to remove Facebook and Instagram from EU.
 In my opinion Metaverse is really Evil and Good. For the evil part, the first problem it's created by facebook (aka now Meta) an corporation who use and sell your data to a lot of ad creator so they can target their ad really precisely. The second problem it's managed by Facebook so we cannot to sure about the future of the metaverse. It's really perveted to use real money to buy virtual housing and object in this metaverse. I can't understand the point of this software as right now, i hope for it to turn really good because on the good part of the metaverse, it's really a good idea to have a big firm, a GAFA to add funds in virtual reality. The Vr community really need funds and visilibity for it to reach the public because it have suffer at the beginning with heavely price and a tides effect where everyone who wears the helmet for more than 30 minutes wanted to vomit. Now the prices of an headset is really cheaper and have really improve the tides effect, but the public remembers only the start of it and Vr is in the shadow so we need big firm to push it in the spotlight for the programmers and the public go back and look and invest in it. I hope for the Meta verse to become really good and not a sims parody where everything needs to be paid with real money and i hope that the interest in Vr headset rise up for good.  Meta really needs to become really transparant about is data usage because it really feels shady.
